title: FPS PROBLEMS!!!
body:
When I first started playing league, I had a solid 5-0-70 fps all game. After about 2 years I now get 70-80 fps in base, and then I go to lane and late game 20-30. I've tried everything; toning down settings, shutting off background processes, upgraded my processors. Nothing helps!!! What do I do? 
any help is helpful thank you {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Your hardware could wear out over time, but there may be simpler solutions here.  Generally, fps issues can be caused by outdated drivers or game files, but there's also a recent Windows update that's causing issues with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Try disabling that as your first step if this is the case for you.  Otherwise, give our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide a go to help tune up your PC.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
